idempiereDocument.description: Asset Preventive Maintenance from OFB Consulting, Chile. Converted to iDempiere as an OSGi plugin feature set, and reviewed by RED1 Sponsored by SYSNOVA, Bangladesh
idempiereDocument.instructions:
Follow more detail instructions and forum support from http://red1.org/adempiere 2Pack.zip here is either imported via normal Pack In window or in OSGi bundle activation under AssetMaintenanceBase plugin.
Run Role Access Update after Pack In has been completed.
idempiereDocument.filenotes: Notes: Contains all application/object settings for package
